Modern Design Home with Pool and Open Views in Monte Olimpo
This beautiful villa is located in the residential area of Monte Olimpo, offering a perfect combination of modern design and natural surroundings. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 elegant bathrooms, and a convenient guest toilet, this home provides an ideal environment for both relaxation and entertainment. The heart of the home is a stunning kitchen, which flows seamlessly into the spacious lounge and dining area. Large windows throughout the house fill the space with natural light, offering open views of the surrounding mountains and nature. Every room in this villa has been carefully designed with high quality materials, ensuring comfort and style. The exterior features a large terrace, perfect for outdoor living and entertaining, which leads to a private swimming pool. The landscaped garden provides a tranquil atmosphere where you can enjoy the Mediterranean climate in complete privacy. For added comfort, this villa is equipped with modern amenities, including efficient heating and air conditioning, making it ideal for year round living. With its prime location just minutes from the Beach and other amenities, this property offers the perfect balance of convenience and luxury.

title: Modern 7 Bedrooms Luxury Villa with Sea and Montgó Views
description:
Luxury 7 Bedroom Villa in a Quiet Jávea Location
This stunning 7 bedroom, 6 bathroom luxury villa in Jávea offers a blend of modern design and Mediterranean charm. Set in the area peaceful of Tarraula, Jávea, the property enjoys views of the Montgó mountain and the Sea, while being just a 10 minute drive from Arenal Beach.InteriorThe villa is laid out across three levels. The open plan living area features a stylish lounge, dining area, and modern kitchen, with large patio doors that bring in natural light. These doors lead directly to a spacious wraparound balcony, offering breathtaking views. The property includes seven generously sized bedrooms, three of which have en suite bathrooms. Additionally, there are two family bathrooms and a guest toilet. The basement houses a large games room equipped with a pool table, gaming area, and dartboard. Every bedroom and the main living spaces are fitted with air conditioning for year round comfort.ExteriorThe villa is situated on a fully enclosed and secure plot, providing maximum privacy. Its landscaped gardens feature a variety of covered and uncovered terraces, ideal for outdoor dining and relaxation. A 10x5m swimming pool serves as the centrepiece of the garden, offering a perfect space to enjoy Jávea’s sunny climate.Additional FeaturesComfort is guaranteed throughout the property with hot and cold air conditioning installed in all key rooms. The secure gated access adds peace of mind, while the spacious layout and amenities make it an excellent choice for a family home, a luxurious holiday retreat, or an investment property.Distance to amenities:-Supermarket: 5.0km-Restaurant: 1.7km-Pharmacy: 5.4km-Medical clinic: 2.4km-International school: 3.2km

description:
Enjoy elegant interiors with high ceilings and large double-glazed windows that open onto spacious sun terraces and a beautiful swimming pool.

	This Villa with its modern and avant-garde design, only 8 minutes from the beach, located on the highest plot, offers panoramic views to the mountains, valley and the sea. This modern design gives life to this unique villa in our residential area of Monte Olimpo in Jávea, where you can enjoy life in this architectural creation just minutes away from schools and international restaurants.

	With a construction of 261 m2 and 200m2 of terrace, distributed in 3 floors with a double carport, the villa has in the basement a double bedroom with an ensuite with window and another space for games or storage room. The main floor consists of a large living-dining room, a spacious open plan fully fitted kitchen with high-quality appliances, a guest toilet, a double bedroom with an ensuite and a terrace with a private pool, all with spectacular views of the Mediterranean Sea.

	The upper floor consists of 2 bedrooms, both with ensuite bathrooms, including the master bedroom which enjoys the most privileged views of this villa, with its own dressing room.

	The villa also includes landscaped Mediterranean gardens. Enjoy elegant interiors with high ceilings and large double-glazed windows that open onto spacious sun terraces and a beautiful swimming pool. The construction of Villa Enigma will be executed to the highest standards and with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring the best results.

title: Renovated 2 Bedroom Apartment Near Arenal Beach
description:
Newly Renovated South Facing Apartment with Luxury Finishings in Prime Location
Located just a short walk from the sought after Arenal beach, this stunning second floor apartment offers a completely renovated and modernised living space. South facing and flooded with natural light, it combines Mediterranean charm with sleek, contemporary design.The apartment boasts two spacious bedrooms, each with its own luxurious open plan bathroom and private toilet, providing a unique suite style layout. A separate guest toilet adds extra convenience for visitors. The modern open plan kitchen is equipped with amazing built in appliances including an induction hob, oven, extractor fan, refrigerator, freezer, and dishwasher. Newly furnished with high quality materials throughout, the space is both functional and elegant. Fitted wardrobes in the bedrooms ensure ample storage, while the double glazed windows with shutters add both comfort and privacy.Enjoy the Mediterranean climate from the small terrace, perfect for outdoor dining or relaxing in the sun. A private parking space is included, offering peace of mind in this prime location. Please note, there is no lift in the building.Comfort is guaranteed year round with air conditioning available in all rooms and fully insulated walls that enhance both energy efficiency and soundproofing. Everything in the apartment is brand new, offering a turn key home or investment in a vibrant and highly desirable area. Distance to amenities:-Supermarket: 150m-Restaurant: 160m-Pharmacy: 280m-Medical emergency centre: 3.7km-International school: 2.0km

title: New build 4 bedroom villa in Cansalades, Javea, Costa Blanca, Spain
description:
Beautifully located just 8 minutes from the beach in the Monte Olimpo urbanization

	Beyond the seductive curves and glass walls lies a modern, luxurious private residence which features over 250 m2 of terrace with sparkling infinity pool, private indoor spa and a full 2 car garage.

	Beautifully located just 8 minutes from the beach in the Monte Olimpo urbanization, this villa is presented on a 2000 m2 plot with views of the Mediterranean Sea and Montgo Mountain. This villa is a well-appointed 4 bedroom 4 bathroom, modern, open plan residence. It features a beautiful master bedroom with private terrace, 3 full guest suites and a spectacular open plan living area that opens to a generous terrace and an infinity pool.

	Modern finishes, fully fitted kitchen and bathrooms, air conditioning, interior alarm, double glazed windows and landscaping are always included with such quality construction.

title: New build 4 bedroom villa in ​​Monte Olimpo Urbanisation, Cansalades, Javea
description:
This Villa offers unique architecture with graceful curves designed for a person looking for something special combined with elegance
This Villa offers unique architecture with graceful curves designed for a person looking for something special combined with elegance.With open panoramic views to the sea and the mountains, this elegant design brings this unique villa to life in our residential area of ​​Monte Olimpo in Javea, where you can enjoy life in this architectural creation just minutes away from the beach, schools international restaurants, and restaurants.Distributed over 3 floors, the villa consists on the ground floor of a large living-dining room, a spacious open-plan fully equipped kitchen, guest toilets, all with a spectacular view of the Mediterranean Sea.The upper floor consists of 3 bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms and built in wardrobes, including the master bedroom which enjoys the most privileged view of this villa, with an open plan bathroom and walk-in closet.On the lower floor is a fourth bedroom with its ensuite bathroom, a laundry room, and the technical room.The villa also has a carport for 2 cars as well as a landscaped Mediterranean garden. title: New build 3 bedroom villa in high quality residential area of Cansalades, Javea
description:
It is ideal for a holiday home in Spain or as a first home in Cansalades, Javea

	Located in a high quality residential area and just a few minutes’ drive from the sea, in one of the most beautiful places on the Spanish coast, this Villa is the ideal place to enjoy in peace. This villa sits on a South facing plot of 1000 m2 in Monte Olimpo, an urbanization offering convenient access to all the amenities of the city.

	This Villa is a luminous two-story villa, with 3 bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms. The main level consists of a living room, a dining room and an open plan kitchen with a courtesy toilet, a bedroom with private bathroom and access to the outdoor terrace. The large windows make this floor both bright and spacious with a view of the naya, the garden and the swimming pool. Upstairs, you will find two additional bedrooms including the master bedroom with access to its private terrace and its en-suite open-plan bathroom, and the other bedroom with its en-suite bathroom.

	This Villa is offered with quality construction and special attention to detail. This includes beautiful finishes, elegant accessories, a fully equipped kitchen, built in wardrobes as well as terraces with gardens and swimming pools. The villa has been designed to be easy to maintain and will be delivered to you key ready, ready to use.

	It is ideal for a holiday home in Spain or as a first home, where you can spend most of your time enjoying the great sunny days and the relaxing lifestyle that Spain has to offer.

title: Charming South Facing Villa in Costa Nova with Pool and Garden
description: Possibility to extend up to ~50m2Set in the desirable residential area of Costa Nova, this charming south facing villa offers a peaceful lifestyle surrounded by greenery. With its sunny orientation and private setting, it provides an opportunity to create your ideal Mediterranean home.The villa is all on one level and features a spacious living room that opens to the south facing open naya. There is a separate dining area that leads on to the kitchen, with a gas hob and extractor fan. There is also a small utility area off the kitchen with access to the back garden. There are three large double bedrooms and two well sized bathrooms, one of them ensuite, offering ample space for family or guests.The property enjoys a landscaped garden that provides a sense of privacy and tranquility. A lovely terrace area surrounds the private swimming pool, perfect for outdoor dining and relaxation throughout the year. There is convenient off road parking as well as additional space to accommodate several cars.The villa benefits from complete double glazing and gas central heating, ensuring comfort during the cooler months. It is equipped with a septic tank and a large gas tank. It offers an excellent foundation for those looking to enhance and modernize a home in one of Costa Nova’s most sought after locations.Distance to amenities:-Supermarket: 1.4km-Restaurant: 300m-Pharmacy: 2.6km-Medical emergency centre: 7.1km-International school: 2.7km

title: Mediterranean Style Luxury Villa with Mountain Views, Private Pool, and Spacious Garden
description:
Stunning Mediterranean Villa, Minutes from Beach, Schools, and Golf Course
This beautiful Mediterranean style luxury villa offers an elegant design with breathtaking mountain views. Situated in a prime location just minutes from the beach this immaculate property provides the ideal setting for relaxed living and entertainment. The villa is distributed over two levels, connected by an internal staircase. The main floor features a bright and airy living and dining room that taking full advantage of the panoramic mountain views. The open plan kitchen is spacious and modern, offering easy access to several terraces with elegant wooden pergolas. These terraces lead to the large garden and swimming pool, creating a seamless flow between indoor and outdoor living. On the same level, you'll find a large bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, providing a private retreat for guests or family members. The garden is well maintained, offers plenty of space for outdoor activities and features a large driveway with space for parking multiple vehicles, accessed through an electric sliding gate with remote control for added convenience and privacy. The property is fitted with air conditioning and heating systems to ensure an optimal living environment, no matter the season. The high quality finishes throughout the villa, along with the large windows that allow natural light to flood the interiors, add to the overall appeal of this magnificent home.

title: 3 bedroom Villa - New Development in Javea - Cumbres Del Tosalet - Villa Aitana
description:

	Contact us today for full price list, availability and payment schedule. All designs can be modified to your wishes, any changes will affect the final price.

title: Stylish and Spacious Renovated Apartment in Old Town
description: This fully renovated and reformed apartment offers an ideal blend of modern style and traditional charm in the heart of the Old Town. Located on the third floor of a classic building , the property boasts generous proportions, elegant finishes, and a peaceful setting just moments from shops, cafés, and local amenities.The apartment features three well designed bedrooms and two modern bathrooms. The master bedroom is particularly spacious and includes a sleek en suite shower room. A second double bedroom offers plenty of room and comfort, while the third is a cosy single bedroom ideal for guests, children, or a home office. Both bathrooms are fitted with stylish walk in showers.The open plan living and dining area is bright and welcoming, thanks to a large window and a small standing balcony that brings in natural light. The kitchen is separate, featuring brand new appliances and ample storage, making it a functional and attractive space for cooking and entertaining. A small entrance foyer provides access to the double bedroom, living room, and hallway leading to the kitchen and remaining bedrooms.Situated on a quiet residential street, the apartment enjoys a calm atmosphere while being close to everything the Old Town has to offer. Though it does not include parking or underground storage, its location and layout make it a perfect low maintenance home. The small standing balcony connected to the living room provides a pleasant spot to enjoy fresh air and sunlight.The property is equipped with hot and cold air conditioning in the living area, ensuring comfort throughout the seasons. All windows are fitted with double glazing and persianas, enhancing insulation and privacy. Sleek and modern finishes are found throughout, along with generous built in storage, making this apartment as practical as it is stylish.Distance to amenities:-Supermarket: 180m-Restaurant: 100m-Pharmacy: 120m-Medical emergency centre: 300m-School: 300m

title: Elegant 4 bedroom Unique Villa with Panoramic Sea Views in Javea
description:
Contemporary Organic Design Villa with Incredible Views, Walking Distance to Beach
This elegant 4 bedroom villa, located in the sought after Monte Olimpo urbanization in Javea Cansalades, offers an extraordinary living experience with panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea. Its organic and contemporary design blends seamlessly and is just a short walk from the beach.The interior is designed to create a sense of openness, featuring flowing spaces and modern finishes. On the main floor, the open plan living, dining, and kitchen areas provide a spacious and stylish area. A guest toilet and a bedroom with an en suite bathroom complete this floor. Moving upstairs, the master suite offers spectacular views of the villa's grounds, including a master bathroom, a large built in wardrobe, and a private terrace. Two additional bedrooms are also located on this level, each with fitted wardrobes and en suite bathrooms. Outside, the villa continues with large terraces surrounding the home, ideal for dining or simply enjoying the breathtaking views. The villa also features ample parking space for convenience and a large swimming pool. Designed with comfort in mind, the villa is equipped with modern amenities such as air conditioning, underfloor heating, and large windows that allow natural light to flood the interior. High ceilings further enhance the feeling of spaciousness and provide a bright, airy atmosphere throughout the home.

title: Elegant Villa with Pool, Jacuzzi, and Home Cinema
description:

This exceptional luxury villa offers an extraordinary living experience on a spacious private plot. With striking contemporary architecture and a focus on high end finishes, this residence combines modern comfort with timeless elegance. Every aspect of the home has been designed to enhance lifestyle, relaxation, and entertainment, making it a true sanctuary of style and sophistication.Inside, the villa features five spacious en suite bedrooms, each offering privacy and comfort with their own beautifully appointed bathrooms. A bespoke designer kitchen forms the heart of the home, blending functionality with refined style. An impressive cinema and multipurpose room adds to the villa’s appeal, providing the ideal space for entertainment or flexible use. The interiors benefit from a carefully planned illumination project that highlights the quality materials and architectural lines throughout.Outdoor living is elevated with expansive terraces and elegant porches that flow seamlessly from the interior spaces. The private pool and jacuzzi are set within a fully custom garden, designed for beauty and tranquility. A stylish barbecue area enhances the outdoor entertaining experience, while parking with a pergola adds both convenience and design continuity.This villa is equipped with an energy efficient aerothermal air conditioning system, ensuring optimal comfort throughout the year. An extended home automation system allows for seamless control of lighting, climate, security, and entertainment from anywhere. Every element has been considered to deliver a modern and personalized living experience.Distance to amenities:-Supermarket: 400m-Restaurant: 220m-Pharmacy: 500m-Medical emergency centre: 4.2km-International school: 1.5km

title: New build 4 bedroom villa in Monte Olimpo Cansalades, Javea
description:
New build 4 bedroom villa in Cansalades, Javea

	With open panoramic views to the sea and the mountains, this elegant design brings this unique villa to life in our residential area of ​​Monte Olimpo. In a prime location in Javea, you can enjoy living in this architectural creation just a few minutes from the beach, in one of Javea's most modern urbanizations.
